original_title: The Legendary Pink Dots ‎– Live At La Luna
overview: Recorded on September 13, 1997 at La Luna, Portland, USA.  1 Hallway Monologue  2 	On High 3  Spike  4  Love In A Plain Brown Envelope  5  Destined To Repeat  6  Harvest Babies  7  Velvet Resurrection  8  Hellsville  9  City Of Needles
title: The Legendary Pink Dots ‎– Live At La Luna
